attributes.action: The introduction of a phone to North Bridge in Halifax.
attributes.additional_details: In the last few months of 2018 there have been a few events in which members of the public have taken there own life in around North Bridge Leisure centre and due to the Bridge being a grade B building it cannot be modified to prevent this. I have come up with what I believe to be an alternative to this.
attributes.background: The addition of a phone to North Bridge in Halifax so that someone who wants to end there own life can pick it up and talk to someone.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
